title: Transmigrated as My Best Friend’s Ex - Novel Updates
tags: Appearance Changes   Arrogant Characters   Charming Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Coma   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Incest   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Reincarnation   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strong Love Interests   Time Skip   Transmigration
author: Zǐ Shǎi Mù Wū   紫色木屋
description: Han Mingxu’s best friend’s ex comes to him, asking him to find his best friend. Han Mingxu suddenly got stung by conscience and decides to do him a favor, and also make some fun of his best friend. But on their way they meet a car accident. When he wakes up, he finds out that he has transmigrated as his best friend’s ex…>
